                     int blocky)

    • Method Detail

      • getScores

        public double[][] getScores()
        Returns:
        A double array representing the scored of each coordinate.

      • returnPath

        public Path returnPath(int x,
                       int y,
                       boolean crossWalls)
                throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Recursively finds a path that should be followed.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the source.
        y - The y coordinate of the source.
        crossWalls - Whether or not the source should walk diagonally over the corners of walls.
        Returns:
        A path object that represents the closest path from the source to the target.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

        Updates pathfinding for new targets and blocks.
